snippet: Lena Dunham and some of the cast members of the HBO comedy series “Girls” spoke about their work on that new series and the issues it raises.
abstract: Stars of HBO comedy Girls, created by Lena Dunham, discuss the new series and the issues it raises about how young women are depicted on television.
lead_paragraph: Lena Dunham and some of the cast members of the HBO comedy series “Girls” spoke about their work on that new series and the issues it raises.

headline.seo: Lena Dunham on ‘Girls,’ Her New HBO Comedy
headline.main: Cable’s New Pack of Girls, Trying on the Woman Thing
headline.print_headline: Cable’s New Pack of Girls, Trying On the Woman Thing
